ing: 1/2 cup SPLENDAÂ® No Calorie Sweetener, Granulated
des: "A creamy, sweet dip for fruit with a lovely pastel pink color.  Try it with your favorite seasonal fruit."
ins: In a medium bowl, place the sour cream, Neufchatel cheese, SPLENDA(R) Granulated Sweetener and raspberry extract. With an electric mixer, blend until smooth. Chill in the refrigerator approximately 30 minutes. Garnish with fresh raspberries to serve.
